summary: The diff implements wrapper components for standardized Button/Card usage and updates global/Tailwind color tokens, plus modifies the three pages. However, several requirements cannot be verified from the provided diff summary (header stickiness, floating WhatsApp visibility across routes, all-site link audit, and YouTube embed fixes). Additionally, the color-token changes appear to introduce/retain non-#25D366 green values, which conflicts with the strict “only #25D366 for any green UI color” requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure every green UI color used anywhere on the site is exactly hex #25D366 (including variables/tokens), replacing any other green values.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff defines additional green tokens/values besides #25D366 (e.g., dark green #1B5E20 and OKLCH values labeled as dark/secondary greens), which contradicts the requirement that no UI element uses any green other than #25D366.
evidence: frontend/src/index.css (defines --morshid-dark and uses multiple green-like OKLCH values e.g., --chart-2, etc.)

missing_requirements.requirement: Standardize button styling site-wide so all buttons share the same visual style (rounded corners and consistent padding/height across all pages).
missing_requirements.reason: The wrapper enforces rounded corners (rounded-lg) but consistent padding/height is not centrally enforced; pages show ad-hoc padding/height classes (e.g., px-8 py-6 h-auto) which suggests per-instance differences rather than a site-wide standard.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx (uses `px-8 py-6 h-auto` on a button instance)
frontend/src/pages/ForFarmersPage.tsx (uses `px-8 py-6 h-auto` on a button instance)

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify the header remains sticky on every route and during scrolling, fixing any cases where it is not sticky (including z-index/overlap issues), without changing header content/navigation.
missing_requirements.reason: No concrete diff content for the header or layout is provided (only a narrative summary in frontend-file-summaries.txt), so stickiness/z-index fixes cannot be verified from the diff evidence.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions SiteLayout/SiteHeader behavior but provides no code diff)

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify the floating WhatsApp button is visible on all pages and remains fixed while scrolling; fix any route/layout issues; link must remain https://wa.me/212623237732 and open in new tab.
missing_requirements.reason: No concrete diff content for WhatsAppFloatingButton or SiteLayout wiring is shown (only a narrative summary), so always-visible rendering and fixed positioning across routes cannot be verified.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions WhatsAppFloatingButton but provides no code diff)

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the two specified hero images with high-quality photo-realistic Moroccan farmers while keeping the same file paths referenced in code.
missing_requirements.reason: The pages reference the specified image paths, but there is no evidence in the diff summary that the actual image assets were replaced (no binary/image file changes shown).

missing_requirements.requirement: Validate that all links across the site work correctly (nav, WhatsApp, mailto, external app link, footer attribution) and fix broken links without changing displayed text.
missing_requirements.reason: Only some links are visible in the truncated diffs (WhatsApp and mailto are shown), but there is no diff evidence covering navigation links, the external app CTA (http://app.morshid.ai), or any footer attribution link validation/fixes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions header/footer links but provides no code diff)

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify/fix the two Home page YouTube embeds (correct embed URLs using same video IDs, responsive sizing, and correct iframe attributes).
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage is truncated before any iframe/embed code is shown; the diff summary does not provide the actual YouTube iframe changes, so compliance cannot be verified.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (claims YouTube videos exist, but no diff evidence)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduction/retention of additional green color tokens (e.g., dark green #1B5E20 and multiple green-like OKLCH tokens) despite a strict requirement that the only green used anywhere is #25D366.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-15 requires replacing any other green values with #25D366, but the diff explicitly defines other green values/tokens.
evidence: frontend/src/index.css (defines --morshid-dark and multiple OKLCH green-like tokens such as --chart-2)
